data.name: Automobilista 2 Demo
data.detailed_description: This Automobilista 2 Demo introduces the Volkswagen TSI Cup by Acelerados - a project developed in partnership with Volkswagen Brazil and the Acelerados TV show, bringing two Volkswagen street cars (the Polo & Virtus TSI 1.0) along with the Velo città race track.
data.about_the_game: This Automobilista 2 Demo introduces the Volkswagen TSI Cup by Acelerados - a project developed in partnership with Volkswagen Brazil and the Acelerados TV show, bringing two Volkswagen street cars (the Polo & Virtus TSI 1.0) along with the Velo città race track.
data.short_description: This Automobilista 2 Demo introduces the Volkswagen TSI Cup by Acelerados - a project developed in partnership with Volkswagen Brazil and the Acelerados TV show, bringing two Volkswagen street cars (the Polo & Virtus TSI 1.0) along with the Velo città race track.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (+ specific versions of 7)
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i5 3450 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX680 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700K / AMD Ryzen7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1080Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
